Join us for the final edition of District Insight for the 2023‚Äì24 school year.

New GMS AP appointed

A Manchester-Shortville educator was appointed the new Geneva Middle School assistant principal.

Geneva CSD budget passes

The Geneva City School District proposed budget passed with over 68 percent voter approval. Candidates Valerie Mallard and Brian Whitley won election to five-year terms on the school board.

Early College grant to open associate degree option at GHS

A $1.18 million Early College High School grant will allow high school students the opportunity to earn an associate‚Äôs degree.

New food services director joins district

The executive chef of a Phelps restaurant joins the district as the new director of food services this spring.

New AP appointed at GHS

Donna McLaughlin, a Geneva High School instructional coach, joins the administrative team there as the new assistant principal.

New AP appointed to GMS

Kyle Pecora, a Victor Central School District educator, has joined Geneva Middle School as the new assistant principal.

District treasurer to be new assistant superintendent

Geneva City School District‚Äôs treasurer, Jesse Lambert, will take on the role of assistant superintendent of business and finance in December.
